articles.description: Rumours of a 28-thread successor have had an instant impact, as retailers drop price on formidable Core i7-13700KF chip.
articles.content:
Intel Core i7-13700KF
“Game and multitask without interruption. Up to 5.4GHz max clock speed, 16 cores, 24 threads, unlocked and overclockable.”
We earn a commission if you make a purchase, at no a… [+1529 chars]
